summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Fourth Avenue Northwest, from East Green Lake Boulevard to East Sixty-fifth Street et al in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete walks under Ordinance No. 18654, creating Local Improvement District No. 1755 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
